title: The Subtle Art of Being A Developer Advocate

metaTags.title: The Subtle Art of Being A Developer Advocate

description.description: Let's try to demystify the role of a Developer Advocate by giving concrete examples of tasks and activities.

heroDescription.heroDescription: Avocado Labs is a way to keep people connected online and have access to quality talks. There will be live talks, which will then be uploaded, where expert speakers can share their knowledge. After each talk there will be a 5min Q&A where our speakers will be able to answer any related questions you may have. These episodes will be hosted and moderated by our Auth0 developer advocates to ensure a safe and friendly environment.

overviewSubsections.title: Panel Discussion: The Subtle Art of Being A Developer Advocate

childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: Let's try to demystify the role of a Developer Advocate by giving concrete examples of tasks and activities.

intro.intro: Wassim is a passionate and supporter of open source. He currently works for Microsoft Azure as Senior Developer Advocate, specialized in JavaScript. In addition to being a contributor on Angular, Bazel and Node.js, Wassim is also the author of many tools for developers such as xlayers.dev and ngx.tools. You can reach out to Wassim any time on his Twitter account @manekinekko or wassim.dev.
